Description: The Flight into Egypt; Joseph leading the Virgin and Child on a donkey to right, an angel above, group of figures on horseback at l Pen and brown ink, with grey and pink wash, squared (and numbered) in red chalk for transfer
Producer name: Attributed to: Francesco Borgani (Attribution suggested by Stefano L'Occaso)
Curator's comments: Italian XVIc. Not in Phillipps-Fenwick. From Phillipps MS 23981. Stefano L'Occaso (email communication 30 May 2023) has kindly suggested an attribution to the late Mannerist Mantuan artist Francesco Borgani.
